-  GET /v1/appEventLocalizations/{id}/relationships/appEventVideoClips 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appEventLocalizations/{id}/relationships/appEventVideoClips

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEventLocalizations-_id_-relationships-appEventVideoClips#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appEventLocalizations/{id}/relationships/appEventVideoClips
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEventLocalizations-_id_-relationships-appEventVideoClips#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEventLocalizations-_id_-relationships-appEventVideoClips#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEventLocalizations-_id_-relationships-appEventVideoClips#response-codes)
